content:
| Segment | Vote | Enthusiasm | Key Drivers |
|---------|------|------------|-------------|
| Culinary Union workers | Sandoval | 7.3/10 | Union loyalty, COVID protection memory |
| Latino community (progressive) | Sandoval | 8.0/10 | Representation, working-class biography |
| Latino business owners | Sandoval | 6.0/10 | Reluctant, anti-Prescott more than pro-Sandoval |
| Conservative Latinos (Cuban) | Sandoval | 5.0/10 | Anti-extremism, Prescott disappointed them |
| Reno transplants | Sandoval | 6.1/10 | Anti-MAGA, but low enthusiasm |
| Reno natives | Sandoval | 5.5/10 | Resentment of Vegas dominance |

---
